offers.name: Smart Flour Foodsâ„¢

rewards.content:
Smart Flour Foodsâ„¢ Fruit Pizza

Ingredients:
â€¢ 2 Smart Flour Foodsâ„¢ Pizza Crusts (thawed)

Fruit mixture
â€¢ 8 oz. washed, stems removed, chopped Strawberries
â€¢ 3 oz. washed Blackberries
â€¢ 8 oz. washed Blueberries
â€¢Â 2 oz. washed Raspberries
â€¢ Â½ cup Granulated Sugar
â€¢Â 1 Tbsp Lemon Zest
â€¢ 1 Tbsp fresh squeezed Lemon Juice

Cream Cheese Spread
â€¢Â 8 oz Cream Cheese softened
â€¢Â 1 Tbsp Lemon Zest
â€¢Â 2 Tbsp fresh squeezed Lemon Juice
â€¢Â 2 Tbsp chopped Fresh Mint

Directions: 
Step 1: Preheat the oven to 450 degrees. Mix the strawberries, blackberries, blueberries, raspberries, sugar, lemon, juice and lemon zest together until fully incorporated. Place the berry mixture into the refridgerator and let stand for 45 minutes.

Step 2: In a separate mixing bowl, add the softened cream cheese, remaining lemon zest and lemon juice. Using the second spatula stir the ingredients together until fully incorporated.

Step 3: After 45 minutes remove the berry mixture from the refrigerator and drain off the excess liquid. Gentle chop the fresh mint. 

Step 4: Equally divide the cream cheese mixture between the two 9 inch pizza crusts making sure to leave a Â½ inch border around the edge. Place the two pizzas into the oven and bake for 5 minutes or until the cream cheese begins to brown.

Step 5: Evenly top each pizza crust with 1 cup of the fruit mixture and then sprinkle each pizza with chopped fresh mint. Cut each pizza into 8 slices and enjoy! 

Source: http://bit.ly/smartflourpizza

offers.name: LindsayÂ® Spanish Manzanilla Pimiento Stuffed Olives

rewards.content:
Deviled Eggs

Ingredients: 
â€¢ 6 large eggs
â€¢Â 1/2 cup finely minced LindsayÂ® Pimiento Stuffed Spanish Manzanilla Olives
â€¢Â 2 tablespoons light mayonnaise
â€¢Â 1 teaspoon Dijon mustard
â€¢Â 1/4 teaspoon hot pepper sauce (such as Tabasco or Crystal)
â€¢ Paprika (optional)
â€¢ Herb sprigs or sliced olives for garnish

Directions: 
Step 1: In a saucepan, cover the eggs with at least an inch of cold water. Bring the eggs to a boil over high heat. Once the water comes to a boil, remove the pan from the heat, cover, and let sit for 15 minutes. Remove the eggs with a slotted spoon and place them into a bowl of ice water until cool.

Step 2: Peel eggs; cut in half lengthwise. Carefully remove the yolks, keeping whites intact.

Step 3: Crumble yolks into a small bowl and mash well with a fork; add olives, mayonnaise, mustard, and pepper sauce; mix well. Spoon mixture into egg-white halves, or pipe with a pastry bag fitted with a very wide tip. (You can also place the mixture into a zip-top bag, cut off a corner, and pipe the mixture into the whites by gently squeezing on the bag.)

Step 4: Arrange on a serving platter; sprinkle with paprika, if desired, and top with an herb sprig or a slice of olive. Keep well refrigerated until serving time.

Source: http://bit.ly/1am9vTt

offers.name: LindsayÂ® Hot Sliced JalapeÃ±o Peppers

rewards.content: Which NEW LindsayÂ® Peppers are you most excited to try?

Game Day Nachos

Ingredients:
â€¢ 1 14-oz bag restaurant-style tortilla chips
â€¢ 1/2 pound Mexican-style chorizo
â€¢ 1/2 pound Colby Jack cheese, grated (about 3 cups), or a mix of cheddar and Jack cheese
â€¢ 1/2 cup LindsayÂ® Hot Sliced JalapeÃ±o Peppers
â€¢ 1 (2.25 oz.) can LindsayÂ® Sliced California Ripe Olives

Directions:
Step 1: Preheat the oven to 350Â°F.

Step 2: Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the chorizo and cook, stirring to break the meat into very fine crumbles. When the chorizo is cooked through, but not yet browned, remove from heat and set aside.

Step 3: Arrange a layer of tortilla chips in the bottom of an oven-proof skillet or baking pan. Sprinkle half of the grated cheese over the top of chips. Scatter half of the chorizo, half of the Hot Sliced JalapeÃ±o Peppers, and half of the Step 4: Sliced Olives over the cheese. Add another layer of chips, cheese, and toppings.

Step 5: Bake in the preheated oven for 10 minutes, or until cheese is melted. 

Step 6: Remove from the oven and garnish with your choice of toppings: LindsayÂ® Hot Chili Peppers, guacamole or chopped avocado, chopped red onion, sour cream, and your favorite salsa.

Source: http://bit.ly/1rTNnrE

offers.name: LindsayÂ® Sliced Golden Greek Pepperoncini

rewards.content: We searched the world for the perfect blend of spicy-sweet tenderness, and discovered these golden Greek pepperoncini. Grown on sun-drenched Grecian farms, they make a zesty companion to sandwiches and pizza and are a must-have for antipasto platters. Add a welcome kick to your favorite pasta salads, or indulge in a zippy low-fat snack straight from the jar.

Zesty Greek Feta Dip

Ingredients:
â€¢ 1 cup drained LindsayÂ® Sliced Golden Greek Pepperoncini peppers
â€¢ 2 tablespoons olive oil, divided use, plus more for garnish
â€¢ 8 oz. crumbled feta cheese (about 1-2/3 cups)
â€¢ 4 oz. part-skim ricotta cheese (about 1/2 cup)
â€¢ 2 teaspoons freshly squeezed lemon juice
â€¢ 1/4 teaspoon dried oregano leaves
â€¢ A few LindsayÂ® Greek Kalamata Pitted Olives or LindsayÂ® Ripe Pitted Olives, for garnish

Directions:
Step 1: Chop the drained pepperoncini into small pieces.

Step 2: In a small frying pan over medium heat, sautÃ© the chopped peppers with 1 tablespoon of the olive oil to soften, 3 to 5 minutes. Transfer the oil and peppers to a medium mixing bowl. (If you prefer, combine the oil and peppers in a medium microwave-safe mixing bowl and microwave on high for 30 seconds to a minute, or until softened, stirring occasionally.)

Step 3: Add the feta and ricotta to the bowl and, using a hand mixer on the lowest speed, mix the cheeses together. Once the feta and ricotta are combined, adjust the mixer to medium speed and whip until the cheese is soft and fluffy. Continue beating as you add the lemon juice and the remaining 1 tablespoon of olive oil.

Step 4: Transfer the dip to a serving bowl. Garnish with the oregano, a drizzle of olive oil, and a few olives.

Step 5: Serve with pita wedges, sliced baguette, or vegetables for dipping.

Source: http://bit.ly/1zSfCFR

rewards.content: LindsayÂ® Sliced Sweet Banana Peppers are perfect:

Cool Summer Salad

Ingredients:
â€¢ 2 tablespoons olive oil, divided
â€¢ 1/3 cup Panko bread crumbs
â€¢ 1/4 cup diced salami
â€¢ 1/4 cup diced smoked mozzarella or provolone cheese
â€¢ 1/4 cup drained LindsayÂ® Sliced Sweet Banana Peppers
â€¢ 1/2 teaspoon dried oregano leaves

Directions:
Step 1: Heat oven to 350Â°F. 

Step 2: Wipe mushrooms with a damp paper towel. Use a spoon or melon baller to scoop out and discard mushroom stems or save for another use. 

Step 3: Brush 1 tablespoon of the olive oil over mushrooms; place cap sides down on a baking sheet.

Step 4: Combine remaining 1 tablespoon oil and remaining ingredients in a medium bowl; mix well. Mound mixture into mushroom caps. 

Step 5: Bake 15 minutes or until heated through. 

Step 6: Serve warm or at room temperature.

Source: http://www.lindsayolives.com/recipes/cool-summer-salad

offers.name: LindsayÂ® Red Roasted Bell Peppers

rewards.content:
Smoky Olive, Gouda, and Bacon Pizza 

Ingredients: 
â€¢ 3 thick slices bacon, preferably applewood smoked
â€¢Â 1/2 cup coarsely chopped sweet or yellow onion
â€¢ 1 (14 oz.) prepared 12-inch round pizza crust
â€¢ 1/2 cup thickly sliced LindsayÂ® Pimiento Stuffed Spanish Manzanilla Olives or LindsayÂ® Sliced Olives
â€¢ 1/3 cup well-drained LindsayÂ® Red Roasted Peppers, cut into thin strips
â€¢ 1 cup (4 oz.) shredded smoked Gouda cheese
â€¢ 2 tablespoons chopped fresh basil or Italian parsley (optional)

Directions: 
Step 1 : Heat oven to 450Â°F. Cut bacon crosswise into thin strips, then sautÃ© bacon and onion in a small skillet over medium heat until bacon is crisp and onion is golden brown, 8 to 10 minutes.

Step 2: Transfer mixture to a paper towel to drain.

Step 3: Meanwhile, place pizza crust on a cookie sheet and scatter olives and bell peppers over pizza; top with reserved bacon mixture. Sprinkle cheese evenly over pizza.

Step 4: Bake 8 to 10 minutes or until crust is golden brown and cheese is melted. Top with basil if desired; cut into wedges.

Source: http://bit.ly/redpepperpizza

rewards.content:
Green Olive and Rosemary Flatbread

Ingredients: 
â€¢ 1 cup warm water (105 to 115Â°F)
â€¢ 1 tablespoon active dry yeast
â€¢ 1 teaspoon sugar
â€¢ 3 cups all-purpose flour
â€¢ 1 teaspoon salt
â€¢ 2 tablespoons olive oil, plus more for bowl and baking sheet
â€¢ 1/2 cup quartered LindsayÂ® Naturals Spanish Olives with Red Peppers
â€¢ 1/2 teaspoon coarse or flaked salt
â€¢ 2 tablespoons fresh rosemary leaves
      
Directions: 
Step 1: Combine water, yeast and sugar in small bowl; set aside until foamy, about 5 minutes.

Step 2: Add flour and salt to bowl of food processor fitted with dough blade and process to combine. Add yeast mixture in 3 or 4 batches, processing between additions.

Step 3: Continue processing until dough forms ball and sides and bottom of processor bowl are clean, then process for 1 minute more.

Step 4: Transfer to large, oiled bowl and loosely cover; set aside to rise until doubled, about 1 1/2 hours.

Step 5: On lightly floured surface, roll or spread dough into approximately 8-by-10-inches. Transfer to oiled baking sheet; set aside 30 minutes.

Step 6: Meanwhile, preheat oven to 500Â°F, ideally with pizza stone.

Step 7: Dimple dough with fingertips; drizzle with oil, then sprinkle with olives and salt.

Step 8: Place baking sheet on pizza stone and bake 10 minutes.

Step 9: Sprinkle with rosemary and continue baking until browned, 3 to 5 minutes.

Tips: You can also make the flatbread dough using a stand mixer and the dough hook attachment. Combine the flour and salt in the mixerâ€™s bowl, add the foamy yeast mixture, and process on medium-low speed for about 5 minutes. Also, try adding cheese to the toppingsâ€” like crumbled blue cheese, shaved Parmesan, or shredded Gruyere.

Source: http://www.lindsayolives.com

rewards.content:
Mediterranean Green Olive Bruschetta

Ingredients: 
â€¢ 1 (6 oz.) can LindsayÂ® Naturals Spanish Manzanilla Olives or other LindsayÂ® Green Pitted Olives, sliced
â€¢ 1 (12 oz.) package cherry or grape tomatoes, halved or quartered.
â€¢ 1/4 cup finely chopped red onion
â€¢ 3 tablespoons finely chopped flat leaf parsley, divided
â€¢ 3 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese, divided
â€¢ 2 tablespoons drained LindsayÂ® Capers
â€¢ Salt and freshly ground black pepper
â€¢ 3 tablespoons olive oil
â€¢ 2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar
â€¢ 1 (12-inch long) loaf French or Italian bread, sliced (1/2-inch thick)
â€¢ 1 large clove garlic, peeled

Directions: 
Step 1: In a large bowl, combine olives, tomatoes, onion, 2 tablespoons of the parsley, 2 tablespoons of the cheese and capers.

Step 2: Add oil and balsamic vinegar; mix well. Add salt and pepper to taste if desired. Let stand 15 minutes.

Step 3: Cover; refrigerate and let stand at room temperature 15 minutes before serving. Mixture may be made 1 day ahead.

Source: http://www.lindsayolives.com

rewards.content:
Dilly Potato Salad with Creamy Champagne Dressing

Ingredients:  
â€¢	2 pounds baby red potatoes, cut into 1/2-inch wedges
â€¢	1 teaspoon salt, plus more to taste
â€¢	1/4 cup olive oil
â€¢	1/4 cup sour cream
â€¢	2 tablespoons mayonnaise
â€¢	2 tablespoons champagne vinegar or white wine vinegar
â€¢	1 teaspoon Dijon-style mustard
â€¢	1/2 cup LindsayÂ® Sliced Black Ripe Olives or LindsayÂ® Naturals Sliced Black Ripe Olives
â€¢	1/4 cup thinly sliced red onion
â€¢	2 tablespoons capers
â€¢	1/4 cup chopped fresh dill
â€¢	Black pepper, to taste

Directions
Step 1: Place potatoes in large pot and cover with water; stir in salt and bring to boil over high heat. 

Step 2: Reduce to simmer and cook until tender, 3 to 5 minutes. Drain and transfer to large bowl; set aside to cool.

Step 3: Meanwhile, combine oil, sour cream, mayonnaise and vinegar in small bowl; set aside.

Step 4: Add dressing and remaining ingredients to potatoes and gently toss; add salt and pepper to taste.

Source: http://bit.ly/DillyPotatoSalad

offers.name: LindsayÂ® Spanish Manzanilla Pimiento Stuffed Olives

rewards.content:
Deviled Eggs

Ingredients: 
â€¢ 6 large eggs
â€¢Â 1/2 cup finely minced LindsayÂ® Pimiento Stuffed Spanish Manzanilla Olives
â€¢Â 2 tablespoons light mayonnaise
â€¢Â 1 teaspoon Dijon mustard
â€¢Â 1/4 teaspoon hot pepper sauce (such as Tabasco or Crystal)
â€¢ Paprika (optional)
â€¢ Herb sprigs or sliced olives for garnish

Directions: 
Step 1: In a saucepan, cover the eggs with at least an inch of cold water. Bring the eggs to a boil over high heat. Once the water comes to a boil, remove the pan from the heat, cover, and let sit for 15 minutes. Remove the eggs with a slotted spoon and place them into a bowl of ice water until cool.

Step 2: Peel eggs; cut in half lengthwise. Carefully remove the yolks, keeping whites intact.

Step 3: Crumble yolks into a small bowl and mash well with a fork; add olives, mayonnaise, mustard, and pepper sauce; mix well. Spoon mixture into egg-white halves, or pipe with a pastry bag fitted with a very wide tip. (You can also place the mixture into a zip-top bag, cut off a corner, and pipe the mixture into the whites by gently squeezing on the bag.)

Step 4: Arrange on a serving platter; sprinkle with paprika, if desired, and top with an herb sprig or a slice of olive. Keep well refrigerated until serving time.

Source: http://www.lindsayolives.com/recipes/deviled-eggs

rewards.content:
Pineapple Coconut Mango Tequila Meatballs

Meatball ingredients:
â€¢ 1 lb. ground beef, lean
â€¢ 1 lb. ground pork
â€¢ 2 cloves garlic, minced
â€¢ Â¼ tsp. jarred ginger
â€¢ Â½ tsp. cumin
â€¢ Â½ tsp. oregano
â€¢ Â½ tsp. salt
â€¢ 1 egg
â€¢ 2 slices white bread
â€¢ â…“ cup milk
â€¢ â…” cup Robert Rothschild FarmÂ® Pineapple Coconut Mango Tequila Sauce

Dipping sauce ingredients:
â€¢ 2 avocados
â€¢ 1 small jalapeÃ±o
â€¢ Â¼ cup mayo
â€¢ Â¼ sour cream
â€¢ 1 lemon, juiced
â€¢ Â½ tsp. salt
â€¢ Â¼ cup cilantro

Directions:
Step 1: Preheat your oven to 400 degrees F. Spray a baking sheet with nonstick spray and set aside.

Step 2: In a small bowl, top bread slices with milk. Let stand for 1-2 minutes.

Step 3: In a large bowl, combine beef, pork, egg, garlic, ginger, cumin, oregano and salt.

Step 4: Squeeze milk from bread and add the bread to beef mixture. Combine beef mixture by handing just until combined. Do not over mix.

Step 5: Shape beef into evenly shaped meatballs and place on baking sheet. Place meatballs in the oven and bake for 20 mins.

Step 6: Pour Pineapple Coconut Mango Tequila sauce into a bowl. Add warm meatballs and stir to coat.

For the Dipping Sauce:
Step 1: Place avocados in a bowl of a food processor along with remaining ingredients; process until smooth.

Source: http://bit.ly/1OnCweG

rewards.content:
Green Olive and Rosemary Flatbread

Ingredients: 
â€¢ 1 cup warm water (105 to 115Â°F)
â€¢ 1 tablespoon active dry yeast
â€¢ 1 teaspoon sugar
â€¢ 3 cups all-purpose flour
â€¢ 1 teaspoon salt
â€¢ 2 tablespoons olive oil, plus more for bowl and baking sheet
â€¢ 1/2 cup quartered LindsayÂ® Naturals Spanish Olives with Red Peppers
â€¢ 1/2 teaspoon coarse or flaked salt
â€¢ 2 tablespoons fresh rosemary leaves
      
Directions: 
Step 1: Combine water, yeast and sugar in small bowl; set aside until foamy, about 5 minutes.

Step 2: Add flour and salt to bowl of food processor fitted with dough blade and process to combine. Add yeast mixture in 3 or 4 batches, processing between additions.

Step 3: Continue processing until dough forms ball and sides and bottom of processor bowl are clean, then process for 1 minute more.

Step 4: Transfer to large, oiled bowl and loosely cover; set aside to rise until doubled, about 1 1/2 hours.

Step 5: On lightly floured surface, roll or spread dough into approximately 8-by-10-inches. Transfer to oiled baking sheet; set aside 30 minutes.

Step 6: Meanwhile, preheat oven to 500Â°F, ideally with pizza stone.

Step 7: Dimple dough with fingertips; drizzle with oil, then sprinkle with olives and salt.

Step 8: Place baking sheet on pizza stone and bake 10 minutes.

Step 9: Sprinkle with rosemary and continue baking until browned, 3 to 5 minutes.

Tips: You can also make the flatbread dough using a stand mixer and the dough hook attachment. Combine the flour and salt in the mixerâ€™s bowl, add the foamy yeast mixture, and process on medium-low speed for about 5 minutes. Also, try adding cheese to the toppingsâ€” like crumbled blue cheese, shaved Parmesan, or shredded Gruyere.

Source: http://www.lindsayolives.com

rewards.content:
Zesty Greek Feta Dip

Ingredients:
â€¢ 1 cup drained LindsayÂ® Sliced Golden Greek Pepperoncini peppers
â€¢ 2 tablespoons olive oil, divided use, plus more for garnish
â€¢ 8 oz. crumbled feta cheese (about 1-2/3 cups)
â€¢ 4 oz. part-skim ricotta cheese (about 1/2 cup)
â€¢ 2 teaspoons freshly squeezed lemon juice
â€¢ 1/4 teaspoon dried oregano leaves
â€¢ A few LindsayÂ® Greek Kalamata Pitted Olives or LindsayÂ® Ripe Pitted Olives, for garnish

Directions:
Step 1: Chop the drained pepperoncini into small pieces.

Step 2: In a small frying pan over medium heat, sautÃ© the chopped peppers with 1 tablespoon of the olive oil to soften, 3 to 5 minutes. Transfer the oil and peppers to a medium mixing bowl. (If you prefer, combine the oil and peppers in a medium microwave-safe mixing bowl and microwave on high for 30 seconds to a minute, or until softened, stirring occasionally.) 

Step 3: Add the feta and ricotta to the bowl and, using a hand mixer on the lowest speed, mix the cheeses together. Once the feta and ricotta are combined, adjust the mixer to medium speed and whip until the cheese is soft and fluffy. Continue beating as you add the lemon juice and the remaining 1 tablespoon of olive oil. 

Step 4: Transfer the dip to a serving bowl. Garnish with the oregano, a drizzle of olive oil, and a few olives. 

Step 5: Serve with pita wedges, sliced baguette, or vegetables for dipping.

Source: http://www.lindsayolives.com

rewards.content:
Chocolate Bottom Banana Bars

Ingredients:
â€¢Â 1 1/2 cups all-purpose flour
â€¢Â 1/2 tsp. baking powder
â€¢Â 1/2 tsp. salt
â€¢Â 1/2 cup (1 stick) unsalted butter, softened
â€¢Â 1 1/2 cups Tate+LyleÂ® Fairtrade Certified Organic Turbinado Sugar
â€¢Â 1 large egg, room temperature
â€¢Â 2 tsp. Fairtrade certified vanilla extract
â€¢Â 1 1/2 cups Fairtrade certified ripe bananas (about 3 medium), mashed
â€¢Â 1/4 cup Fairtrade certified semi-sweet chocolate chips
â€¢Â 1/4 cup Fairtrade certified chopped walnuts (optional)
â€¢ 1/4 cup Fairtrade certified unsweetened cocoa powder

Directions:

Step 1: Preheat oven to 350ËšF. Grease a 13-in. x 9-in. baking pan and line with parchment paper. Meanwhile, combine flour, baking powder and salt, in a bowl and set aside.

Step 2: In a large bowl, cream butter and sugar until light and fluffy; add egg and vanilla. Stir in bananas. Add flour mixture, mixing well. Pour half of batter into a large bowl. Add chocolate chips and nuts (optional) to original batter; mix well. To the other half of batter add cocoa and mix well.

Step 3: Spread cocoa batter into prepared pan. Spoon remaining batter on top. Bake 35 minutes or until a toothpick inserted comes out clean. Transfer pan on to a wire rack and cool completely in pan. Invert onto a cutting board; remove parchment paper. Cut into 18 bars.

Source: http://bit.ly/tatelylebananabar

Use Tate+LyleÂ® Organic Turbinado Raw Cane Sugar just as you would granulated sugar. Use it in recipes, for sweetening beverages, or for sprinkling on baked goods.  The lightly refined, golden brown sugar adds a delicate molasses flavor and its distinctive crystals provide a superb added crunch. Perfect for coffee, cookies, and muffins!

rewards.content:
Deviled Eggs

Ingredients: 
â€¢ 6 large eggs
â€¢Â 1/2 cup finely minced LindsayÂ® Pimiento Stuffed Spanish Manzanilla Olives
â€¢Â 2 tablespoons light mayonnaise
â€¢Â 1 teaspoon Dijon mustard
â€¢Â 1/4 teaspoon hot pepper sauce (such as Tabasco or Crystal)
â€¢ Paprika (optional)
â€¢ Herb sprigs or sliced olives for garnish

Directions: 
Step 1: In a saucepan, cover the eggs with at least an inch of cold water. Bring the eggs to a boil over high heat. Once the water comes to a boil, remove the pan from the heat, cover, and let sit for 15 minutes. Remove the eggs with a slotted spoon and place them into a bowl of ice water until cool.

Step 2: Peel eggs; cut in half lengthwise. Carefully remove the yolks, keeping whites intact.

Step 3: Crumble yolks into a small bowl and mash well with a fork; add olives, mayonnaise, mustard, and pepper sauce; mix well. Spoon mixture into egg-white halves, or pipe with a pastry bag fitted with a very wide tip. (You can also place the mixture into a zip-top bag, cut off a corner, and pipe the mixture into the whites by gently squeezing on the bag.)

Step 4: Arrange on a serving platter; sprinkle with paprika, if desired, and top with an herb sprig or a slice of olive. Keep well refrigerated until serving time.

Source: http://www.lindsayolives.com/recipes/deviled-eggs

Dr PepperÂ® Chocolate Cherry Cupcakes

Ingredients:
â€¢ 1-1/2 cups of Dr PepperÂ® Cherry Soda (keep 2 tablespoons separate)
â€¢ 1 box of devilâ€™s food chocolate cake mix
â€¢ 1 can of vanilla frosting

Instructions:
Step 1: Preheat oven to 375Â°F.

Step 2: Combine contents of the cake mix with Dr PepperÂ® Cherry soda in a bowl and stir.

Step 3: Fill metal muffin baking tray with cupcake liners. Pour Dr PepperÂ® Cake batter into liners until each is about 3/4 full. Bake for approximately 15 minutes.

Step 4: While cupcakes bake, prepare icing by mixing 2 tablespoons of Dr PepperÂ® Cherry soda with 1 can of vanilla frosting.

Step 5: Remove cupcakes from oven. Once cooled, apply icing to cupcakes.

Recipe created by Ashliegh from The Darling Daily Blog. Visit http://sharefunshine.com for additional recipes and ideas!

rewards.content:
Dilly Potato Salad with Creamy Champagne Dressing

Ingredients: 
â€¢ 2 pounds baby red potatoes, cut into 1/2-inch wedges
â€¢ 1 teaspoon salt, plus more to taste
â€¢Â 1/4 cup olive oil
â€¢Â 1/4 cup sour cream
â€¢ 2 tablespoons mayonnaise
â€¢Â 2 tablespoons champagne vinegar or white wine vinegar
â€¢Â 1 teaspoon Dijon-style mustard
â€¢Â 1/2 cup LindsayÂ® Sliced Black Ripe Olives or LindsayÂ® Naturals Sliced Black Ripe Olives
â€¢Â 1/4 cup thinly sliced red onion
â€¢Â 2 tablespoons LindsayÂ® Capers
â€¢Â 1/4 cup chopped fresh dill
â€¢Â Black pepper, to taste

Directions: 
Step 1: Place potatoes in large pot and cover with water; stir in salt and bring to boil over high heat.

Step 2: Reduce to simmer and cook until tender, 3 to 5 minutes.

Step 3: Drain and transfer to large bowl; set aside to cool.

Step 4: Meanwhile, combine oil, sour cream, mayonnaise and vinegar in small bowl; set aside.

Step 5: Add dressing and remaining ingredients to potatoes and gently toss; add salt and pepper to taste.

Source: http://bit.ly/DillyPotatoSalad

offers.name: LindsayÂ® Recloseablesâ„¢ California Ripe Olives

rewards.content:
Lindsay Roasted Olives

Ingredients: 
â€¢ 1 pint (2 cups) grape or cherry tomatoes
â€¢Â 3 cups of any type of LindsayÂ® Olives
â€¢Â 1 tablespoon herbs de Provence blend or a mix of dried rosemary and thyme
â€¢Â 8 whole garlic cloves, peeled
â€¢ 1/4 cup olive oil
â€¢ 1/4 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper

Directions: 
Step 1: Heat oven to 425Â°F. In a medium bowl, combine all ingredients; mix well.

Step 2: Transfer mixture to a 15x10-inch jelly roll pan.

Step 3: Bake 15 to 20 minutes or until the tomatoes have shriveled and browned lightly. Cool on the pan. Transfer to a shallow bowl. Serve at room temperature with toasted baguette slices or crackers.

Source: http://bit.ly/Marinatedolives

offers.name: LindsayÂ® Spanish Manzanilla Pimiento Stuffed Olives

rewards.content:
Deviled Eggs

Ingredients: 
â€¢ 6 large eggs
â€¢Â 1/2 cup finely minced LindsayÂ® Pimiento Stuffed Spanish Manzanilla Olives
â€¢Â 2 tablespoons light mayonnaise
â€¢Â 1 teaspoon Dijon mustard
â€¢Â 1/4 teaspoon hot pepper sauce (such as Tabasco or Crystal)
â€¢ Paprika (optional)
â€¢ Herb sprigs or sliced olives for garnish

Directions: 
Step 1: In a saucepan, cover the eggs with at least an inch of cold water. Bring the eggs to a boil over high heat. Once the water comes to a boil, remove the pan from the heat, cover, and let sit for 15 minutes. Remove the eggs with a slotted spoon and place them into a bowl of ice water until cool.

Step 2: Peel eggs; cut in half lengthwise. Carefully remove the yolks, keeping whites intact.

Step 3: Crumble yolks into a small bowl and mash well with a fork; add olives, mayonnaise, mustard, and pepper sauce; mix well. Spoon mixture into egg-white halves, or pipe with a pastry bag fitted with a very wide tip. (You can also place the mixture into a zip-top bag, cut off a corner, and pipe the mixture into the whites by gently squeezing on the bag.)

Step 4: Arrange on a serving platter; sprinkle with paprika, if desired, and top with an herb sprig or a slice of olive. Keep well refrigerated until serving time.

Source: http://www.lindsayolives.com/recipes/deviled-eggs

rewards.content:
Santa Fe Olive Toss

Ingredients: 
â€¢	1 1/2 (4.5 oz.) jars of LindsayÂ® Spanish Queen Olives Stuffed with Spicy JalapeÃ±o, drained, coarsely chopped (about 1 1/2 cups)
â€¢	1 (6 oz.) can of LindsayÂ® Black Ripe Pitted Olives or LindsayÂ® Naturals Green Ripe California Pitted Olives (about 1 1/2 cups), drained, coarsely chopped
â€¢	1 ear of cooked corn, cooled and kernels cut off the cob or canned sweet corn (about 4 oz.)
â€¢	1 small red bell pepper, stemmed and seeded, diced
â€¢	1 small yellow bell pepper, stemmed and seeded, diced
â€¢	5 green onions, thinly sliced
â€¢	3/4 cup canned black beans, rinsed and drained
â€¢	2 tablespoons freshly squeezed lime juice
â€¢	4 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil
â€¢	1 teaspoon ground cumin powder
â€¢	1 teaspoon chili powder
â€¢	1/4 cup chopped fresh cilantro
â€¢	Salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste

Directions: 
Step 1: Combine olives, corn, peppers, green onions and black beans.

Step 2: In a small bowl, whisk together lime juice and olive oil.

Step 3: Add cumin, chili powder and cilantro to olive mixture; mix well.

Step 4: Taste and season with salt and pepper as needed.

Source: http://bit.ly/SantaFeOliveToss

Garlicky Lemon Olives

rewards.content:
Lindsay Roasted Olives

Ingredients: 
â€¢ 1 pint (2 cups) grape or cherry tomatoes
â€¢Â 3 cups of any type of LindsayÂ® Olives
â€¢Â 1 tablespoon herbs de Provence blend or a mix of dried rosemary and thyme
â€¢Â 8 whole garlic cloves, peeled
â€¢ 1/4 cup olive oil
â€¢ 1/4 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper

Directions: 
Step 1: Heat oven to 425Â°F. In a medium bowl, combine all ingredients; mix well.

Step 2: Transfer mixture to a 15x10-inch jelly roll pan.

Step 3: Bake 15 to 20 minutes or until the tomatoes have shriveled and browned lightly. Cool on the pan. Transfer to a shallow bowl. Serve at room temperature with toasted baguette slices or crackers.

offers.name: LindsayÂ® Spanish Manzanilla Pimiento Stuffed Olives

rewards.content:
Deviled Eggs

Ingredients: 
â€¢ 6 large eggs
â€¢Â 1/2 cup finely minced LindsayÂ® Pimiento Stuffed Spanish Manzanilla Olives
â€¢Â 2 tablespoons light mayonnaise
â€¢Â 1 teaspoon Dijon mustard
â€¢Â 1/4 teaspoon hot pepper sauce (such as Tabasco or Crystal)
â€¢ Paprika (optional)
â€¢ Herb sprigs or sliced olives for garnish

Directions: 
Step 1: In a saucepan, cover the eggs with at least an inch of cold water. Bring the eggs to a boil over high heat. Once the water comes to a boil, remove the pan from the heat, cover, and let sit for 15 minutes. Remove the eggs with a slotted spoon and place them into a bowl of ice water until cool.

Step 2: Peel eggs; cut in half lengthwise. Carefully remove the yolks, keeping whites intact.

Step 3: Crumble yolks into a small bowl and mash well with a fork; add olives, mayonnaise, mustard, and pepper sauce; mix well. Spoon mixture into egg-white halves, or pipe with a pastry bag fitted with a very wide tip. (You can also place the mixture into a zip-top bag, cut off a corner, and pipe the mixture into the whites by gently squeezing on the bag.)

Step 4: Arrange on a serving platter; sprinkle with paprika, if desired, and top with an herb sprig or a slice of olive. Keep well refrigerated until serving time.

Source: http://www.lindsayolives.com/recipes/deviled-eggs

offers.name: Smoking Loon

rewards.content:
Smokin' Cubano Sammie

Ingredients:
â€¢ 2 large French, Italian or traditonal Cuban sandwich rolls 
â€¢Â 4 oz. each 2 Tablespoons seeded mustard
â€¢ 2 Tablespoons real mayonnaise
â€¢Â 1/4 teaspoon minced garlic
â€¢ 1-2 green onions, chopped 
â€¢ 4 teaspoons pepperoncini peppers, chopped
â€¢ 4 oz. cheese, thinly sliced
â€¢ 2 medium dill pickles, very thinly sliced
â€¢Â 4-6 oz. smoked ham, thinly sliced
â€¢ 4-6 oz. smoked turkey, thinly sliced
â€¢ 4 pieces of smoked bacon, cooked
â€¢Â 2 Tablespoons real butter, softened

Directions: 
Step 1: Cut rolls lengthwise and lay on a cutting board. 

Step 2: Spread cut sides with Inglehoffer mustard, mayonnaise and minced garlic.

Step 3: Sprinkle with green onions and pepperoncini peppers. 

Step 4: Layer bread with half of the cheese, the pickles and meats, finishing with remaining cheese and bacon. 

Step 5: Close sandwiches and press down firmly.

Step 6: Spread butter on the outsides of both sandwiches and wrap them separately in foil. 

Step 7: Heat a griddle, frying pan or barbecue to medium hot, and heat sandwiches side by side, turning often and pressing down as they cook. 

Step 8: Remove when sandwiches are heated through and cheese is melted, about 7-10 minutes.

Step 9: Unwrap each sandwich, cut in half, and serve with a side salad and generous glasses of Smoking Loon Steelbird Unoaked Chardonnay or Pinot Noir.

offers.name: LindsayÂ® Naturals Spanish Manzanilla Olives Stuffed with Red Peppers

rewards.content: LindsayÂ® Naturals Spanish Manzanilla Olives Stuffed with Red Peppers

options.content: Have no artificial colors, flavors or preservatives
Are tastefully tart with a delicate hint of lemon
Are sweet and slightly salty in perfect harmony

rewards.content:
Green Olive and Rosemary Flatbread

Ingredients: 
â€¢ 1 cup warm water (105 to 115Â°F)
â€¢ 1 tablespoon active dry yeast
â€¢ 1 teaspoon sugar
â€¢ 3 cups all-purpose flour
â€¢ 1 teaspoon salt
â€¢ 2 tablespoons olive oil, plus more for bowl and baking sheet
â€¢ 1/2 cup quartered LindsayÂ® Naturals Spanish Olives with Red Peppers
â€¢ 1/2 teaspoon coarse or flaked salt
â€¢ 2 tablespoons fresh rosemary leaves
      
Directions: 
Step 1: Combine water, yeast and sugar in small bowl; set aside until foamy, about 5 minutes.

Step 2: Add flour and salt to bowl of food processor fitted with dough blade and process to combine. Add yeast mixture in 3 or 4 batches, processing between additions.

Step 3: Continue processing until dough forms ball and sides and bottom of processor bowl are clean, then process for 1 minute more.

Step 4: Transfer to large, oiled bowl and loosely cover; set aside to rise until doubled, about 1 1/2 hours.

Step 5: On lightly floured surface, roll or spread dough into approximately 8-by-10-inches. Transfer to oiled baking sheet; set aside 30 minutes.

Step 6: Meanwhile, preheat oven to 500Â°F, ideally with pizza stone.

Step 7: Dimple dough with fingertips; drizzle with oil, then sprinkle with olives and salt.

Step 8: Place baking sheet on pizza stone and bake 10 minutes.

Step 9: Sprinkle with rosemary and continue baking until browned, 3 to 5 minutes.

Tips: You can also make the flatbread dough using a stand mixer and the dough hook attachment. Combine the flour and salt in the mixerâ€™s bowl, add the foamy yeast mixture, and process on medium-low speed for about 5 minutes. offers.name: Sugar In The Raw Organic WhiteÂ®

rewards.content: Sugar In The Raw Organic WhiteÂ® is an environmentally friendly, eco-social certified alternative to ordinary white sugar. But it cooks and bakes exactly the same, so use it in all your favorite recipes. Taste buds (and planet) rejoice!

Chocolate Fig Cake

Ingredients:
â€¢ 1 cup chopped dried black mission figs
â€¢ 1 cup hot brewed coffee
â€¢ 1 cup butter, softened
â€¢ 1 cup Sugar In The Raw Organic WhiteÂ®
â€¢ 2 eggs
â€¢ 2 tsp vanilla
â€¢ 1 cup buttermilk
â€¢ 1Â¾ cups plus 1 tbs all-purpose flour, divided
â€¢ Â¾ cup unsweetened baking cocoa powder
â€¢ 1Â½ teaspoons baking soda
â€¢ Â½ tsp baking powder
â€¢ 2 oz white chocolate baking bar
â€¢ 1 oz bittersweet chocolate baking bar
â€¢ Â¼ teaspoon vegetable oil

Directions:
Step 1: Heat oven to 350Â°F. Spray heavy nonstick 12-cup fluted tube pan with cooking spray. In medium bowl, mix figs and coffee; set aside. In large bowl, beat butter and Sugar In The Raw Organic WhiteÂ® with electric mixer on medium speed until smooth and creamy. Beat in eggs and vanilla. Slowly add buttermilk. Beat in 1Â¾ cups flour, cocoa, baking soda and baking powder on low speed until mixed. Drain figs, reserving coffee. Slowly mix in reserved coffee. Pour batter into pan. Pat figs dry with paper towels. Sprinkle with 1 tablespoon flour and toss to coat. Sprinkle over batter in pan. Pull table knife through batter to distribute figs. Bake 40 to 50 minutes or until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean. Cool in pan 10 minutes. Remove from pan to cooling rack. Cool completely, about 1 hour.

Step 2: In 2 small microwavable bowls, melt white baking bar and bittersweet baking bar with a few drops of oil. Drizzle white chocolate over cake with fork. Then drizzle dark chocolate over cake. Let stand until set, about 2 hours. Or refrigerate 15 minutes until completely set.

Source: http://www.intheraw.com

For best baking results, we recommend replacing half the sugar in the recipe with Stevia In The RawÂ® to achieve desired browning and rising. For no-bake recipes, you can replace all the sugar with Stevia In The RawÂ®!

offers.name: Monk Fruit In The RawÂ®

rewards.content: Did you know that Monk Fruit In The RawÂ® is made from delicious vine-ripened monk fruit, also called luo han guo? Originally harvested in the 13th century, itâ€™s been making life more delicious for years!

Red Reviver

Ingredients:
â€¢ 1 small beet
â€¢ 1 carrot
â€¢ 1 small ripe tomato
â€¢ 1 two and a half inch wedge of red cabbage
â€¢ Â½ red bell pepper
â€¢ Â¾ cup diced fresh pineapple
â€¢ 1 packet Monk Fruit In The RawÂ®
â€¢ Â½ cup cold water, optional


Directions:
Step 1: Cut up all the ingredients according to the directions for your juicer or blender.

Step 2: Using a juicer, process the beet, carrot, tomato, cabbage, bell pepper, and pineapple. Mix the Monk Fruit In The RawÂ® into the juice.

Step 3: For blender, pour in the water first, then add all the remaining ingredients and whirl to the texture of a smoothie. Pour into a tall glass. Serve immediately.

Source: http://www.intheraw.com/

Try Just Peachy Iced Tea - sweetened with 
Sweet'N LowÂ®! 

Ingredients: 

â€¢Â 4 cups boiling water
â€¢Â 8 regular tea bags
â€¢Â 3/4 cup peach nectar or juice, chilled
â€¢Â 8 packets Sweet'N LowÂ® zero calorie sweetener
â€¢Â 2 cups frozen peach slices 
â€¢Â 4 cups ice 

Step 1: Pour boiling water over tea bags in a 2-quart nonmetal heatproof pitcher. Steep for 5 minutes. Remove and squeeze tea bags.

offers.name: PREÂ® BEEF

rewards.content: PREÂ® BEEF has more of the good, less of the bad and none of the ugly. NO antibiotics and NO added hormones, 38% LESS calories and 63% LESS fat than other beef, with approximately 100% MORE flavorâ€¦. NEW in stores.

Ribeye Steak with Bacony-Brussels Sprouts

Ingredients (for 2): 
â€¢ 2  PREÂ® BEEF Ribeye Steaks 
â€¢ 2 oz bacon, diced
â€¢ 1 yellow onion, halved and sliced thin
â€¢ 4 oz brussels sprouts, quartered

Directions: 
For the Sides:
Step 1: In a hot pan, cook bacon until browned.

Step 2: Add onion and cook until partially soft. 

Step 3: Add brussels sprouts and cook for ~5 minutes or until just tender.

Step 4: Season with salt & pepper.

For the Steak:
Step 1: Brush with Extra Virgin Olive Oil and season on both sides with plenty of salt & pepper. 

Step 2: Use a hot grill or hot pan to cook through, however you take your steak.

Attention cooks! 
PREÂ® BEEF steaks cook a little faster than you may be used to. 
For Gas Grill or Stove Top turn to highest heat and try this minutes/side guide: 
Med-Rare 4-6 | Med 5-7 | Med-Well 6-8 
Let rest for 5-10 minutes for best results.

Source: http://bit.ly/Ribeyesteakwithbrusselssprouts

offers.description: Grass Fed Strip Steak - 10 oz. package
offers.name: PREÂ® BEEF

rewards.content: PREÂ® BEEF has more of the good, less of the bad and none of the ugly. NO antibiotics and NO added hormones, 38% LESS calories and 63% LESS fat than other beef, with approximately 100% MORE flavorâ€¦. NEW in stores.

STRIP STEAK WITH MUSTARD CRUST CRUNCH & LEMON BROCCOLINI

Ingredients (for 2): 
â€¢Â 2  PREÂ® BEEF Strip Steaks 
â€¢ 4 tbsp of wholegrain mustard
â€¢Â 1/2 cup breadcrumbs
â€¢Â 1 sprig rosemary, chopped
â€¢Â 1 bunch of broccolini
â€¢Â 2 tbsp olive oil
â€¢Â 1 large wedge of lemon
â€¢ 1/2 rind of a lemon; peeled and sliced thin

Preparation: 
For the Sides:
Step 1: Preheat oven to 400'F.

Step 2: Toss the broccolini in olive oil, salt & pepper, and a squeeze of the lemon.

Step 3:  Roast for 8-10 minutes.

For the Steak: 
Step 1: Sear the steak in a hot pan on both sides for 2 minutes each.

Step 2: Smear with mustard, then sprinkle heavily with breadcrumbs and rosemary.

Step 3: Bake at 400'F for ~6-10 minutes to cook through, however you take your steak.

offers.name: TysonÂ® All Natural Premium Cornish Hens

rewards.content:
Grilled Cornish Hens with Citrus Herb Brine

Ingredients:
â€¢ 1/2 gallon cold water
â€¢ 1/2 cup kosher salt
â€¢ 1/2 cup brown sugar
â€¢ 1/2 cup KikkomanÂ® Soy Sauce
â€¢ 1 orange, cut into quarters
â€¢ 1 lemon, cut into quarters
â€¢ 3 sprigs fresh rosemary, chopped
â€¢ 2 TysonÂ® Cornish Hens
â€¢ 1-2 Tbsp. olive oil

Directions:
Step 1: In a large stock pot, mix water, salt, brown sugar, and soy sauce to create brine. Stir well until sugar and salt are dissolved.

Step 2: Add chopped rosemary and juice from the orange and lemon. Stir to combine. Place hens in brine, cover, and refrigerate for at least 2 hours or overnight.

Step 3: Remove hens from brine and rinse well inside and out.

Step 4: Place hens on grill, skin-side down. Cover and grill 25 minutes. Turn hens using tongs; cover and grill 25 minutes longer or until done (internal temp 180 degrees F)

Not sure how to prepare a Cornish Hen? TysonÂ® 100% all natural Cornish Hens taste great cooked on the grill or roasted in the oven! Pick up some today for an exciting meal the whole family will love.

rewards.content:
Mediterranean Sausage Pita

Prep Time: 15 minutes 
Cook Time: 10 minutes
Makes 4 servings (2 filled pita halves each)

Ingredients:
â€¢ 1 lb. Jimmy DeanÂ® Premium Pork Sausage
â€¢ 1 tablespoon chopped fresh oregano or 1 teaspoon dried oregano
â€¢ 2 teaspoons minced garlic
â€¢ 2 teaspoons lemon juice
â€¢ 2 cups baby spinach leaves (about 3 ounces), coarsely chopped
â€¢ 3 plum tomatoes, seeded, chopped
â€¢ 1 pkg. (4 ounces) crumbled feta cheese
â€¢ â…“ cup chopped kalamata olives (about 15 olives)
â€¢ â…› teaspoon ground black pepper
â€¢ 4 pita bread rounds (with pockets), cut in half
â€¢ Thin red onion slices (optional)

Directions:
Step 1: Cook sausage, oregano and garlic in large skillet over MEDIUM-HIGH heat 8-10 minutes or until sausage is thoroughly cooked, stirring frequently; drain. Return sausage mixture to skillet. Stir in lemon juice.

Step 2: Combine spinach, tomatoes, cheese, olives and pepper in large bowl.

Step 3: Fill pita halves with sausage mixture, then spinach mixture. Add onion slices, if desired.

Source: http://bit.ly/MedSausagePita

rewards.content:
Ranch Country Marinade Grilled Chicken

Ingredients:
â€¢ 1 cup chicken broth 
â€¢ 1 (1-oz.) packet Hidden ValleyÂ® Original RanchÂ® Salad Dressing & Seasoning Mix 
â€¢ 1 tsp. spicy brown mustard 
â€¢ 3 lbs. TysonÂ® All NaturalÂ® Individually Frozen Boneless Skinless Chicken Thighs, thawed 

Instructions 
Step 1: In a bowl, mix the seasoning mix together with the chicken broth and mustard until smooth. Place thawed chicken thighs in a GladÂ® Food Storage Zipper Bag with seasoning mixture. Seal the bag and marinate for 1 hour. 

Step 2: Preheat the grill to MEDIUM heat. 

Step 3: Remove the chicken from the bag and discard the marinade. Grill the chicken about 10 to 12 minutes on each side or until juices run clear and temperature on instant read thermometer reaches 170Â°F. Remove the chicken from the grill and let stand covered for 5 minutes before serving.

Source: http://bit.ly/RanchGrilledChicken

offers.name: TysonÂ® Fresh Boneless Skinless Chicken Thighs

rewards.content:
Grilled Chicken Lettuce Wraps With Spicy Mango Marinade 

Ingredients:
â€¢ 1 (18-oz.) can diced water chestnuts drained 
â€¢ 1 clove garlic peeled, minced 
â€¢ 1 Tbsp. sesame oil 
â€¢ 1 Tbsp. dark brown sugar 
â€¢ 1-1/4 pound TysonÂ® boneless, skinless chicken thighs (4â€“6 thighs) 
â€¢ 2 tsp. soy sauce 
â€¢ 3 green onions, white and green parts, thinly sliced 
â€¢ 3 oz. fresh button or white mushrooms, wiped clean, stems trimmed, diced 
â€¢ 6 to 8 Boston or butter lettuce leaves, rinsed well, patted dry 
â€¢ 1/2 cup KC MasterpieceÂ® Spicy Mango Marinade 
â€¢ 1/2 tsp. rice vinegar 
â€¢ Asian Honey-Mango Sauce 
â€¢ 1 Tbsp. hoisin sauce 
â€¢ 2 Tbsp. honey 
â€¢ 2 tsp. KC MasterpieceÂ® Spicy Mango Marinade 
â€¢ 2â€“3 tsp. chili paste (add more to increase spicy flavor) 

Instructions:
Step 1: Preheat the grill and build a charcoal fire for direct grilling. 

Step 2: In a 2-quart GLADÂ® storage bag, combine the chicken and 1/2 cup of KC MasterpieceÂ® Spicy Mango Marinade. Seal the bag and toss until well coated. Chill for at least 30 minutes. 

Step 3: In a small sauce pan, add the honey, hoisin, chili paste and the remaining marinade, and cook over a medium heat for 3 to 5 minutes or until the marinade mixture is well blended and heated through. Remove the pan from the heat and set aside. 

Step 4: In a small bowl, add the water chestnuts, mushrooms, green onion, garlic, soy, brown sugar, sesame oil and vinegar and stir until well blended. Pour this mixture into the center of a 12" x 12" sheet of heavy-duty foil. Fold the foil over the mushroom mixture, seal the edges and pierce with a fork. 

Step 5: Place the foil packet on the grill and cook for 12 to 15 minutes. Grill the chicken for 5 to 7 minutes on each side or until juices run clear. Remove the chicken and the foil packet from the grill and let stand until cool enough to handle. Dice the chicken into 1/4-inch pieces and remove to small serving dish. 

Step 6: Remove the mushroom mixture from the packet, drain the liquid and place in a small bowl. Toss the mushrooms with the marinade mixture until well coated. 

Step 7: Trim the stem from each lettuce leaf and shape each leaf into a cup. Fasten with a toothpick if needed. Divide the chicken evenly between the lettuce cups and top with the sauce, or serve the lettuce on the side for guests to fill their own tasty appetizer.

Source: http://bit.ly/SpicyChickenLettuceWraps
For which occasions do you typically grill? Select all that apply.

Chardonnay Squeeze

Recipe:
1.5 oz [yellow tail] chardonnay
0.5 oz. brandy
splash of agave nectar or 0.5 oz of simple syrup

2 fresh basil leaves
float of orange liqueur

rewards.content:
Strawberry-Fudge Brownies

Ingredients:
â€¢ 1 box Betty Crockerâ„¢ fudge brownie mix
â€¢ Â¼ cup water
â€¢ â…” cup vegetable oil
â€¢ 2 eggs
â€¢ 1 cup frozen strawberries, thawed, drained
â€¢ Â½ cup chopped pecans
â€¢ Â½ cup chopped almonds
â€¢ Â½ cup flaked coconut
â€¢ Â½ cup Betty Crockerâ„¢ Rich & Creamy chocolate frosting (from 1 lb. container)

Directions:
Step 1: Heat oven to 325Â°. Grease bottom only of 13x9 in. pan with cooking spray or shortening.

Step 2: In medium bowl, beat brownie mix, water, oil, and eggs with electric mixer on low speed 1 minute, scraping bowl occasionally. Add strawberries, beat 2 minutes longer. Stir in pecans, almonds, and coconut. Spread butter in pan.

Step 3: Bake 40 to 45 minutes or until toothpick inserted in center and 2 in. from side of pan comes out almost clean. Cool completely, about 1 hour.

Step 4: In small microwaveable bowl, microwave frosting uncovered on High about 15 seconds or until frosting can be stirred smooth. Spread or drizzle frosting over brownies.

Source: http://bit.ly/1HjERav

rewards.content:
Easy Quiche Recipe
Pairs well with Belle AmbianceÂ® Pinot Grigio & Chardonnay
 
Ingredients:
â€¢ 1 cup fontina cheese, grated
â€¢ 1 puff pastry, thawed
â€¢ 6 large eggs, beaten
â€¢ 1 cup milk
â€¢ Pinch of salt and pepper
â€¢ Pinch of cayenne pepper

Optional Add-ons:
â€¢ Chopped spinach, diced shallots and/or onions, mushrooms; cleaned and diced
 
Directions:
Step 1: Preheat oven to 375Âº F.

Step 2: Spray mini muffin tin with nonstick cooking spray, set aside.

Step 3: Using a small round cutter, cut puff pastry and place into indentations of muffin tin. 

Step 4: Put in oven to pre-bake for about 15 minutes.

Step 5: Whisk together eggs and milk until light and fluffy. 

Step 6: Add cheese, salt, pepper and cayenne pepper. 

Step 7: Pour into shells and top with optional add-ons as desired. 

Step 8: Bake for 15-25 minutes until egg mixture is set. Remove from oven and let rest 5 minutes before serving.

rewards.content: Especially formulated with women in mind, AriaÂ® Womenâ€™s Wellness Protein helps nourish your body inside & out. This holistic protein provides the perfect balance of rBGH-free whey & non-GMO plant-based protein plus Designer Protein'sÂ® women's wellness blend (including biotin, vitamins, minerals, fiber, and folate) for a toned body and healthy-looking skin, hair, & nails.

Banana Protein Pancakes

Ingredients: 
â€¢ 1/2 cup AriaÂ® Womenâ€™s Wellness Protein Powder 
â€¢ 1/2 cup unbleached white or white whole wheat four 
â€¢ 2 tsp baking powder 
â€¢ 1/4 tsp salt 
â€¢ 1 large banana, ripe, mashed well 
â€¢ 1 cup 1% milk (or almond milk) 
â€¢ 3 large egg whites 
â€¢ 2 tsp oil 
â€¢ 1 tsp vanilla 
â€¢ 1/4 cup mini dark chocolate 
â€¢ cooking spray 

Directions: 
Step 1: Combine all dry ingredients. Mix milk, egg white, oil, vanilla and mashed bananas in another medium sized bowl and stir until smooth. 

Step 2: Add wet ingredients to the dry and stir well with a wooden spoon until there are no more dry spots. Don't over-mix.

Step 3: Heat a large skillet on medium-low heat. Lightly spray a skillet with cooking spray, place the mold on the hot skillet and pour 1/4 cup of pancake batter. 

Step 4: When the pancake starts to bubble and the edges begin to set, flip the pancakes. 

Step 5: Repeat with the remainder of the batter.

Dilly Potato Salad with Creamy Champagne Dressing

Ingredients: 
â€¢ 2 pounds baby red potatoes, cut into 1/2-inch wedges
â€¢ 1 teaspoon salt, plus more to taste
â€¢Â 1/4 cup olive oil
â€¢Â 1/4 cup sour cream
â€¢ 2 tablespoons mayonnaise
â€¢Â 2 tablespoons champagne vinegar or white wine vinegar
â€¢Â 1 teaspoon Dijon-style mustard
â€¢Â 1/2 cup LindsayÂ® Sliced Black Ripe Olives or LindsayÂ® Naturals Sliced Black Ripe Olives
â€¢Â 1/4 cup thinly sliced red onion
â€¢Â 2 tablespoons LindsayÂ® Capers
â€¢Â 1/4 cup chopped fresh dill
â€¢Â Black pepper, to taste

Directions: 
Step 1: Place potatoes in large pot and cover with water; stir in salt and bring to boil over high heat.

Step 2: Reduce to simmer and cook until tender, 3 to 5 minutes.

offers.name: SCHARFFEN BERGERÂ® Chocolate Baking Bars

rewards.content:
John Scharffenberger's Favorite Brownies

Ingredients: 
â€¢ 6 ounces SCHARFFEN BERGERÂ® 70% Cacao Bittersweet Chocolate
â€¢ Â¾ cup butter
â€¢ 1-Â½ cups sugar
â€¢Â 3 eggs
â€¢ 1 teaspoon vanilla
â€¢Â 1 cup flour
â€¢ 1 cup chopped nuts (optional)

Directions: 
Step 1: Preheat the oven to 325Â° F with a rack in the lower third. Butter a 9â€x13â€ baking pan (or line it with parchment paper).

Step 2: Melt the chocolate and butter in the top of a double boiler over simmering water, stirring frequently until smooth.

Step 3: Remove the top of the double boiler and stir in the sugar. Add eggs one by one, stirring thoroughly after each on. Stir in the vanilla. Add the flour and stir until well blended. Stir in the nuts. Scrape the batter in the pan and spread it evenly.

Grilled Herb Chicken and Asparagus

Ingredients:
â€¢ 1 1/2 lbs.TysonÂ® Chicken Breast Tenderloins
â€¢ 1/2 cup Lawry'sÂ® Herb & Garlic Marinade with Lemon Juice, divided
â€¢ 1 lb. asparagus, trimmed

Instructions:
1. Place chicken in a ZiplocÂ® brand bag with Easy Open Tabs (gallon size). Add 1/4 cup of the marinade; turn to coat well. Place asparagus in a second resealable plastic bag. Add remaining 1/4 cup marinade; turn to coat. Refrigerate chicken and asparagus 30 minutes.

2. Remove chicken from marinade. Discard marinade. Remove asparagus from marinade. Reserve asparagus marinade.

3. Grill chicken over medium heat 6 to 7 minutes per side or until internal temperature reaches 170Â°F. Grill asparagus 4 minutes or until tender-crisp, turning occasionally. Brush chicken and asparagus with reserved marinade. If desired, grill lemon slices 30 seconds per side. Serve chicken with asparagus. Garnish with lemon slices.

offers.name: Honeysuckle WhiteÂ® Fresh Ground Turkey

rewards.content: Honeysuckle WhiteÂ® Fresh Ground Turkey:

options.content: Is made from turkeys raised without growth-promoting antibiotics
Is made from turkeys raised by 700 independent family farmers
Offers premium quality without the premium price

rewards.content:
Quinoa Turkey Sliders with Cilantro Mint Sauce

Ingredients:
â€¢ 1 cup packed fresh mint leaves
â€¢ 1 cup packed fresh cilantro leaves
â€¢ 1/4 cup sliced natural or blanched almonds
â€¢ 1 jalapeÃ±o, seeded and coarsely chopped
â€¢ 1/4 cup extra-virgin olive oil
â€¢ Water
â€¢ 3 tablespoons freshly squeezed lime juice
â€¢ 1/2 teaspoon kosher salt
â€¢ 1/2 cup quinoa, rinsed and drained in a fine sieve
â€¢ Water
â€¢ Kosher salt
â€¢ 2 green onions, white and green parts, sliced
â€¢Â 1 (1.2-pound) package Honeysuckle WhiteÂ® Ground Turkey
â€¢ 1 teaspoon ground cumin
â€¢ 1/4 teaspoon ground allspice
â€¢ 1/4 teaspoon red pepper flakes, preferably Aleppo pepper
â€¢ Cooking oil spray
â€¢ 1 dozen dinner rolls, split
â€¢ Thinly sliced red onions
â€¢ Cilantro sprigs

Directions: 
Step 1: Process mint, cilantro, almonds and jalapeÃ±o in a food processor until very finely chopped, scraping the bowl as needed. With the machine running, gradually pour oil through the feed tube, followed by 1/3 cup water and lime juice. Process until smooth, about 1 minute. Transfer to a small bowl and stir in the salt. Set aside.

Step 2: Bring quinoa, 3/4 cup water and 1/2 teaspoon salt to a boil in a small saucepan over high heat. Cover and reduce the heat to low. Cook until quinoa is tender and has absorbed liquid, about 20 minutes. Transfer to a bowl and cool completely.

Step 3: Pulse quinoa and green onions in food processor until finely chopped. Transfer to a large bowl.

Step 4: Combine quinoa mixture with turkey, cumin, allspice, crushed hot pepper and 1 teaspoon kosher salt; mix well. Using wet hands, shape into 12 small patties, each about 3 inches wide and 1/2 inch thick.

Step 5: Heat a large griddle or two medium nonstick skillets over medium heat. Spray with cooking oil. Add the patties and cook, turning halfway through cooking, until golden brown and firm when pressed, about 8 minutes.

Step 6: For each slider, put a patty in a roll and top with red onions, cilantro and a spoonful of the sauce.

For food safety, cook to a minimum internal temperature of 165 degrees F as measured by a meat thermometer.

Step 6: For each slider, put a patty in a roll and top with red onions, cilantro and a spoonful of the sauce.

For food safety, cook to a minimum internal temperature of 165 degrees F as measured by a meat thermometer.

rewards.content:
Dilly Potato Salad with Creamy Champagne Dressing

Ingredients: 
â€¢ 2 pounds baby red potatoes, cut into 1/2-inch wedges
â€¢ 1 teaspoon salt, plus more to taste
â€¢Â 1/4 cup olive oil
â€¢Â 1/4 cup sour cream
â€¢ 2 tablespoons mayonnaise
â€¢Â 2 tablespoons champagne vinegar or white wine vinegar
â€¢Â 1 teaspoon Dijon-style mustard
â€¢Â 1/2 cup LindsayÂ® Sliced Black Ripe Olives or LindsayÂ® Naturals Sliced Black Ripe Olives
â€¢Â 1/4 cup thinly sliced red onion
â€¢Â 2 tablespoons LindsayÂ® Capers
â€¢Â 1/4 cup chopped fresh dill
â€¢Â Black pepper, to taste

Directions: 
Step 1: Place potatoes in large pot and cover with water; stir in salt and bring to boil over high heat.

Step 2: Reduce to simmer and cook until tender, 3 to 5 minutes.

Step 3: Drain and transfer to large bowl; set aside to cool.

Step 4: Meanwhile, combine oil, sour cream, mayonnaise and vinegar in small bowl; set aside.

Step 5: Add dressing and remaining ingredients to potatoes and gently toss; add salt and pepper to taste.

Source: http://bit.ly/DillyPotatoSalad

LindsayÂ® Roasted Olives

Ingredients: 
â€¢ 1 pint (2 cups) grape or cherry tomatoes
â€¢ 3 cups of any type of LindsayÂ® Olives
â€¢ 1 tablespoon herbs de Provence blend or a mix of dried rosemary and thyme
â€¢ 8 whole garlic cloves, peeled
â€¢ 1/4 cup olive oil
â€¢ 1/4 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper

Directions: 
Step 1: Heat oven to 425Â°F.

Step 2:  In a medium bowl, combine all ingredients; mix well.

Step 3: Transfer mixture to a 15x10-inch jelly roll pan.

Step 4: Bake 15 to 20 minutes or until the tomatoes have shriveled and browned lightly.

Step 5:  Cool on the pan. Transfer to a shallow bowl.

Step 6:  Serve at room temperature with toasted baguette slices or crackers.

Source: http://bit.ly/RoastedOlives

offers.name: LindsayÂ® Spanish Manzanilla Pimiento Stuffed Olives

rewards.content:
Deviled Eggs

Ingredients: 
â€¢ 6 large eggs
â€¢Â 1/2 cup finely minced LindsayÂ® Pimiento Stuffed Spanish Manzanilla Olives
â€¢Â 2 tablespoons light mayonnaise
â€¢Â 1 teaspoon Dijon mustard
â€¢Â 1/4 teaspoon hot pepper sauce (such as Tabasco or Crystal)
â€¢ Paprika (optional)
â€¢ Herb sprigs or sliced olives for garnish

Directions: 
Step 1: In a saucepan, cover the eggs with at least an inch of cold water. Bring the eggs to a boil over high heat. Once the water comes to a boil, remove the pan from the heat, cover, and let sit for 15 minutes. Remove the eggs with a slotted spoon and place them into a bowl of ice water until cool.

Step 2: Peel eggs; cut in half lengthwise. Carefully remove the yolks, keeping whites intact.

Step 3: Crumble yolks into a small bowl and mash well with a fork; add olives, mayonnaise, mustard, and pepper sauce; mix well. Spoon mixture into egg-white halves, or pipe with a pastry bag fitted with a very wide tip. (You can also place the mixture into a zip-top bag, cut off a corner, and pipe the mixture into the whites by gently squeezing on the bag.)

Step 4: Arrange on a serving platter; sprinkle with paprika, if desired, and top with an herb sprig or a slice of olive. Keep well refrigerated until serving time.

Source: http://www.lindsayolives.com/recipes/deviled-eggs

rewards.content:
Copitas (Stuffed Bell Peppers) 

Ingredients: 
â€¢ 2 cups cooked Nueva Cocina Mexican Rice Mix (or more if desired) 
â€¢ 1 Nueva Cocinaâ„¢ Chipotle Taco Mix or Cuban Style Picadillo Mix 
â€¢ 1 lb. ground beef or turkey 
â€¢ 5-6 medium sized bell peppers 
â€¢ 1 (8 oz.) tomato puree 
â€¢ 1/2 cup shredded Jack & Cheddar cheese 
â€¢ 2 Roma tomatoes (or other tomato) chopped 
â€¢ 1 bunch scallions chopped (optional) 

Directions: 
Step 1: Cut off tops of peppers and remove seeds and membrane. 

Step 2: Bring water to boil in a large stock pot. Once boiling add peppers and blanche for about 10 minutes or until slightly cooked, but still firm. 

Step 3: While peppers are blanching, cook meat according to directions on seasoning packet. 

Step 4: In a large bowl add cooked ground beef, cooked rice, chopped tomatoes, onions and 1/4 cup shredded cheese. Mix well. 

Step 5: Stuff peppers with meat mixture and place in a 3-quart baking dish. Sprinkle remaining cheese over the stuffed peppers. 

Step 6: Bake at 350Â° F for 30 minutes until peppers are tender and mix is browned. 

Source: http://www.nuevacocina.com/recipes/

rewards.content:
Quinoa Turkey Sliders with Cilantro Mint Sauce

Ingredients:
â€¢ 1 cup packed fresh mint leaves
â€¢ 1 cup packed fresh cilantro leaves
â€¢ 1/4 cup sliced natural or blanched almonds
â€¢ 1 jalapeÃ±o, seeded and coarsely chopped
â€¢ 1/4 cup extra-virgin olive oil
â€¢ Water
â€¢ 3 tablespoons freshly squeezed lime juice
â€¢ 1/2 teaspoon kosher salt
â€¢ 1/2 cup quinoa, rinsed and drained in a fine sieve
â€¢ Water
â€¢ Kosher salt
â€¢ 2 green onions, white and green parts, sliced
â€¢Â 1 (1.2-pound) package Honeysuckle WhiteÂ® Ground Turkey
â€¢ 1 teaspoon ground cumin
â€¢ 1/4 teaspoon ground allspice
â€¢ 1/4 teaspoon red pepper flakes, preferably Aleppo pepper
â€¢ Cooking oil spray
â€¢ 1 dozen dinner rolls, split
â€¢ Thinly sliced red onions
â€¢ Cilantro sprigs

Directions: 
Step 1: Process mint, cilantro, almonds and jalapeÃ±o in a food processor until very finely chopped, scraping the bowl as needed. With the machine running, gradually pour oil through the feed tube, followed by 1/3 cup water and lime juice. Process until smooth, about 1 minute. Transfer to a small bowl and stir in the salt. Set aside.

Step 2: Bring quinoa, 3/4 cup water and 1/2 teaspoon salt to a boil in a small saucepan over high heat. Cover and reduce the heat to low. Cook until quinoa is tender and has absorbed liquid, about 20 minutes. Transfer to a bowl and cool completely.

Step 3: Pulse quinoa and green onions in food processor until finely chopped. Transfer to a large bowl.

Step 4: Combine quinoa mixture with turkey, cumin, allspice, crushed hot pepper and 1 teaspoon kosher salt; mix well. Using wet hands, shape into 12 small patties, each about 3 inches wide and 1/2 inch thick.

Step 5: Heat a large griddle or two medium nonstick skillets over medium heat. Spray with cooking oil. Add the patties and cook, turning halfway through cooking, until golden brown and firm when pressed, about 8 minutes.

Step 6: For each slider, put a patty in a roll and top with red onions, cilantro and a spoonful of the sauce.

For food safety, cook to a minimum internal temperature of 165 degrees F as measured by a meat thermometer.

Platillo al Horno (Chicken Casserole)

Ingredients: 
â€¢ 1 Nueva Cocinaâ„¢ Taco Fresco Mix (or Chipotle Taco Mix) 
â€¢ 1lb. boneless skinless chicken thighs (or breasts if preferred), cut into bite-size pieces
â€¢ 2 Tbsp. olive oil 
â€¢ 1 can black beans, rinsed 
â€¢ 1/2 cup frozen corn 
â€¢ 2 green onions, chopped 
â€¢ 1 cup  chunky salsa 
â€¢ 1/2 cup Cheddar cheese 
â€¢ 1/3 cup chopped cilantro (optional) 
â€¢ Serve with Nueva Cocina Mexican Rice or Black Beans & Rice Mix

Directions: 
Step 1: Preheat oven to 375Âº F. Place chicken into a bowl and toss with seasoning mix to evenly coat. 

Step 2: In a large skillet over medium-high heat â€“ add the oil and then the chicken. Cook for about 5 minutes (until browned, 165Â° F), stirring occasionally. 

Step 3: Place into the bottom of a 1.5 qt. casserole dish and layer with beans, corn, onions, salsa and cilantro. Bake around 20 min. Remove and top with cheese and bake for a few minutes until melted. 

Step 4: Serve over Nueva Cocina Mexican Rice or Black Beans & Rice Mix. 

Source: http://www.nuevacocina.com/recipes/

offers.name: SURE-JELLÂ® Premium Fruit Pectin

rewards.content:
30 Minutes To Homemade SURE-JELLÂ® Strawberry Freezer Jam

Ingredients: 
2 cups crushed strawberries (buy 1 qt. fully ripe strawberries)
4 cups sugar, measured into separate bowl
3/4 cup water
1 pkg. SURE-JELLÂ® Premium Fruit Pectin

Directions:
Step 1: Rinse 5 (1-cup) plastic containers and lids with boiling water. Dry thoroughly. Discard stems. Crush strawberries thoroughly, 1 cup at a time. Measure exactly 2 cups prepared fruit into large bowl. Stir in sugar. Let stand 10 min., stirring occasionally.

Step 2: Mix water and pectin in small saucepan. Bring to boil on high heat, stirring constantly. Continue boiling and stirring 1 min. Add to fruit mixture; stir 3 min. or until most the sugar is dissolved. (A few sugar crystals may remain.)

Step 3: Fill containers immediately to within 1/2 inch of tops. Wipe off top edges of containers; immediately cover with lids. Let stand at room temperature 24 hours. Jam is now ready to use. Store in refrigerator up to 3 weeks or in freezer up to 1 year. (If frozen, thaw in refrigerator before using.)

Source: http://www.kraftrecipes.com/recipes/30-minutes-homemade-surejell-strawberry-freezer-jam-50137.aspx

rewards.content:
CERTOÂ® Strawberry Freezer Jam

Ingredients: 
â€¢Â 2 cups prepared fruit (buy about 1 qt. fully ripe strawberries)
â€¢Â 4 cups sugar, measured into separate bowl
â€¢Â 1 pkg. CERTOÂ® Premium Fruit Pectin
â€¢Â 2 Tbsp. fresh lemon juice

Directions: 
Step 1: Rinse clean plastic containers and lids with boiling water. Dry thoroughly.

Step 2: Stem and crush strawberries thoroughly, one layer at a time. Measure exactly 2 cups prepared fruit into large bowl. Stir in sugar. Let stand 10 min., stirring occasionally.

Step 3: Mix pectin and lemon juice in small bowl. Add to strawberry mixture; stir 3 min. or until sugar is dissolved and no longer grainy. (A few sugar crystals may remain.)

Step 4: Fill all containers immediately to within 1/2 inch of tops. Wipe off top edges of containers; immediately cover with lids. Let stand at room temperature 24 hours. Jam is now ready to use. Refrigerate up to 3 weeks or freeze up to 1 year. Thaw in refrigerator.

Source: http://www.kraftrecipes.com/recipes/certo-strawberry-freezer-jam-60268.aspx
